case_circumstances: White male found deceased in a concrete drainage culvert off of HIghway 95 at Mile Post 193.3 in Lake Havasu City, AZ.  Was not there 3-4 weeks earlier when culvert was last accessed.  Appears to be between 50-60 years of age. 6'0" tall and 180lbs.  Was wearing blue jean pants, a black belt, a green "Hawaii Beach Club" T-shirt and a pair of socks.  Near the body was two cans of "Skoal- long cut" tobacco, a leather pouch, a "West Virginia" baseball cap, and pink and blue handkerchief, a long sleeve paisley print shirt and a pair of white Reebox tennis shoes, size 10 1/2.
case_clothing_on_body: Blue jeans, black belt, socks, and green "Hawaii Beach Club" T-shirt.
case_clothing_with_body: Black "West Virginia" baseball cap, pink and blue handkerchief and long sleeve paisley print shirt.
case_footwear: Size 10 1/2 white Reebok tennis shoes near body.
case_other_items_with_body: Two cans of "Skoal-long cut" tobacco, two packets of "tylenol, extra strength gel caps."  A plastic 1.59 quart water bottle "Rim Rock Natural".
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
